Reviews.Title: “Not worth it”
Reviews.Author: Travelbug2107
Reviews.Content: It was one of the tiniest rooms we have lived in, no telephone, no toiletries, nothing. The worst thing is that the manager tried to overcharge us. Luckily I had the email booking which quoted the lesser amount. She tried to say that it was a mistake, she spoke in German, which I could not understand. Eventually my German friend stepped in and retrieved the extra cash. The breakfast was substandard, not much variety.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Parkidyll
HotelInfo.Address: Heinrich-Mann-Strasse 6, 13156 Berlin, Germany
